CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 28, 1953, pg, 26, reads: "Proud Champions - Here are the four Negro youths who captured the Golden Gloves titles at the Gardens Tuesday night... Henry Hickman, the tourney's best boxer and the winner in 135-pound division, and Basil Blackson, 118-pound champion. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight boxers, including Golden Gloves boxing champion Basil Blackson second from left, posed in boxing ring in Duquesne Gardens
